sourcesContent:
import Footer from './Footer'; import '../index.css'; import React, { useCallback, useEffect, useState, useRef } from 'react'; import { reactLocalStorage } from "reactjs-localstorage"; import axios from 'axios'; function Home() { const [int_brand, setint_brand] = useState([]); const name = localStorage.getItem('name'); const [brand1, setbrand1] = useState([]); const [brand2, setbrand2] = useState([]); const [brand3, setbrand3] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/users/'+name+'/') .then(res => { console.warn(res.data.user_interest_brands) setint_brand(res.data.user_interest_brands); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error) }) }, []); useEffect(() => { var str = "" + int_brand var item = str.split(',') console.warn(item + '********item***********'); console.warn(item + '********item***********' + item[1]); localStorage.setItem("brand1",item[0]) localStorage.setItem("brand2",item[1]) localStorage.setItem("brand3",item[2]) }, [loading]) setTimeout(() => { setLoading(true) }, 3000); const b1 = localStorage.getItem('brand1'); const b2 = localStorage.getItem('brand2'); const b3 = localStorage.getItem('brand3'); const getUsers = async () => { console.warn('**********************item at api*****'+item[0]) await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/brandapi/' + b1 + '/') // axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/brandapi/khaadi/') .then(res => { console.warn(res) setbrand1(res.data) }) axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/brandapi/'+b2+'/') .then(res => { console.warn(res.data) setbrand2(res.data) }) axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/brandapi/'+b3+'/') .then(res => { console.warn(res.data) setbrand3(res.data) }) } return( <>
